column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat rocks; after you get past the hostess (w/ long straight hair).  She is a little edgy.  After that
column4: was a delight. The menu has a wonderful variety to select from. We went for breakfast. My wife had blueberry pancakes which were delicious. Her over easy egg was cooked to perfection. I enjoyed the cheesy hash browns and scrambled eggs. I was offered chipotle sauce and habanero sauce for my eggs
column5: both were fabulous. The diner itself is very well lit
column6: and inviting. There is a central communal table
column8: and bar stools. Don't miss Little Goat Diner.
